float32.name: Rain Amount
float32.tooltip: fade control for all rain effects

plugin.comment: These effects are applied when this rain is active

float32.name: Size
float32.tooltip: size of the rain particles

float32.name: Maximum Vertical Camera-Relative Motion
float32.tooltip: the max velocity in which we allow world-relative vertical rain motion. over this velocity we clamp to camera-relative vertical rain motion

float32.name: Maximum Aspect Ratio
float32.tooltip: height to width ratio

float32.name: Minimum Aspect For Intensity
float32.tooltip: intensity will scale inversely with aspect ratio, this clamps the aspect ratio before scaling

float32.name: Intensity
float32.tooltip: brightness of the rain drops

float32.name: Alpha Scale
float32.tooltip: transparency of the rain drops

float32.name: Drop Near Fade Distance
float32.tooltip: distance at which the drops fade out

float32.name: Collision Range
float32.tooltip: depth range over which the particle will search for collisions with the depth buffer

float32.name: Splash Size
float32.tooltip: length of a side of the splash particle card

float32.name: Splash Height
float32.tooltip: height off the ground of the center of the splash particle

float32.name: Splash Lifetime
float32.tooltip: how long the splash lasts

float32.name: Near Fade Distance
float32.tooltip: distance at which the splash fades out

float32.name: Splash Intensity
float32.tooltip: brightness of the splashes

float32.name: Splash Alpha
float32.tooltip: transparency of the splashes

float32.name: Ripple Initial Size
float32.tooltip: size of the ripple at impact

float32.name: Ripple Maximum Size
float32.tooltip: maximum size of the ripple

float32.name: Ripple Lifetime
float32.tooltip: how long the ripples last

float32.name: Ripple Intensity
float32.tooltip: intensifies ripples

float32.name: Rain Drop Length Compensation
float32.tooltip: make it longer when it is far
